function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortages of essential medical resources, including SARS-CoV-2 testing kits, ventilators, and personal protective equipment","Impact":"Increased risk of inability to effectively manage and control the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase national reserves of critical medical supplies and optimize production workflows for medical equipment","Technologies":"Automation of medical manufacturing, scalable solutions for scientific research funding","People":"Public health agencies, hospitals, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of preparation for future pandemics","Impact":"Risk of being unprepared to respond to future contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Increase national reserves of critical medical supplies and improve preparation for future pandemics","Technologies":"Automation of medical manufacturing, scalable solutions for scientific research funding","People":"Public health agencies, hospitals, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate funding for scientific research during pandemics","Impact":"Inability to develop low-cost, scalable solutions for managing and controlling contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement a shift in the approach to funding scientific research during pandemics to promote low-cost, scalable solutions","Technologies":"Scalable solutions for scientific research funding","People":"Research institutions, scientists, public health agencies","Owner":"Government, research institutions"}]}
